entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who had plans for seizing power and schemes for Muggle torture. He is also described as having dreams of the Deathly Hallows, in which the narrator encouraged him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who burst out saying that Dumbledore would have been better than Fudge or Scrimgeour as Minister of Magic.

relationships.description: Dumbledore had dreams in which Harry encouraged him.
Harry said that Dumbledore would have been better than Fudge as Minister of Magic.
